title: VFX Render Farm Job Failure
description: A high-priority VFX shot for a feature film fails to render on the automated render farm.

tasks.description: Identify the failed render job and retrieve its error log from the render queue manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the log, which shows a 'Missing Texture File' error.

tasks.description: Check the digital asset management system to verify the location of the missing texture file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the texture file was recently moved to a new directory.

tasks.description: Update the scene file with the correct file path for the texture.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the path in the scene file.

tasks.description: Resubmit the render job to the queue with a high priority.
